text: Ðis syd þa landgemere to alresforda.
Erest up of cendefer andlang mearce on þa witan dic.
<../images/tbar.gif>andlang dic on mearc weg andland weges on þer dene.
On þer dene on smalandene, of smalandene andlang hlinces on bucgen oran.
<../images/tbar.gif>ford andlang wyrtwale on þa rode, andlang rode on wilames ord.
Þonon on spreot mere þonon on þo twibutme del.
Þonon on beran delle, on mint mere.
Of mintmere on feldene, þonne andlang feldene on þone hagan.
Þonne andlang hagan on grem meres syðle.
Þonon andlang hagan on bocmeres syðle.
Of bocmeres shiðle on hamer dene gat.
Þonne non on hrombmescumbes geat, of hramnescumbes geate on dun shihle.
Of dun shihle andlang mearce ut at ricgsceate.
<../images/tbar.gif>andlang mearce to dregtune on þane ford.
Of ðan forda on wuda ford<../images/tbar.gif>up of þan forda andlang mearce on þane garan uf werðne.
Of þan garan nord ofer þast ret.
Andlang mearce on þa æwylmas andlang wylla on ticceburnan þonne andlang streames on iccenan.
Andlang icenan on þer cendefer ut scyt.
Þonne up andlang cendefer oð þar hit on feng.
